text: Sarah Kauss is an American businesswoman. She is the founder of S'well. ==Early life and education== Kauss was raised in Jupiter, Florida. She received a bachelor's degree in accounting from the University of Colorado Boulder and her MBA from Harvard Business School. ==Career== Kauss founded S'well in 2010. Fortune included Kauss on its 2014 40 under 40 list. In 2016, Kauss was named number 49 on the Business Insider 100 list, The Creators. She was recognized on Inc.'s "Most Impressive Women Entrepreneurs of 2016" list. Kauss has been featured in NPR, Inc. Magazine, Entrepreneur magazine, Fortune magazine, CNNMoney, and CNBC, among other outlets. She is a mentor for the U.S. Department of State Global Women's Mentoring Partnership. ==References== ==Other websites== * *S'well website Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:Businesspeople from Florida
title: Sarah Kauss
